scripts.dr:redis: sudo docker container stop redis ; sudo docker container stop redis_insight ; sudo docker container rm redis ; sudo docker container rm redis_insight ; sudo docker compose -f ./docker/redis/compose.yml up -d && sudo docker ps

scripts.dr:web: sudo docker container stop es-web-dev ; sudo docker container rm es-web-dev ; sudo docker image rm jpmadrigal/es-web-dev:latest ; sudo docker pull jpmadrigal/es-web-dev:latest && sudo docker compose -f ./docker/web/compose.yml up -d && sudo docker ps
